I have figured out a way to reveal what Dio's Stand truly is.
Whenever Noriaki Kakyoin sees his Hierophant Green, this is what he remembers.
Your little Noriaki does not try at all to make friends.
It is not that the other kids do not like him.
He just does not open up to anyone.
As his teacher, I am very concerned.
I am his mother, yet I still do not know why he is like that.
Ever since I was a child, I thought
that living in a city means meeting a lot of people.
But even in an entire lifetime,
how many people meet others they can truly understand, and who understand them?
My classmates' address books are filled with their friends' names.
There must be about fifty friends in each.
My mother has my father, and my father has my mother.
I am sure rock stars and people on TV have tens of thousands of friends.
I probably will not ever have someone who sees me for who I am.
Because I do not have a single friend who can see
those who cannot see him to understand me.
Until I met Mr. Joestar, Jotaro, Polnareff, and Avdol,
I felt that way all the time.
I wonder why I get goosebumps
when I think about Avdol and Iggy.
the first friends I shared a common goal with.
Even though it lasted only a few weeks,
they became friends I could truly connect with.
I will make him invisible to everyone, just like he used to be.
Yes, to reveal Dio's true identity and defeat him,
I will make his presence completely disappear.
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
The old man and Dio are on the rooftops.
Only Kakyoin and Joseph are before me.
They split up so they could attack from both sides.
So Jotaro and Polnareff must intend to attack me from behind.
Hierophant's barrier, which activates when touched,
completely surrounds you for 20 meters in every direction!
Now I can sense both your movements and The World's!
Take this, Dio! 20-meter radius Emerald Splash!
that The World's true power is, indeed, the power to reign over this world!
I think my injuries are fatal.
I cannot even lift a finger.
That means it is around midnight in Japan.
I wonder what my parents are doing.
I am sorry for making you worry so much.
were not of his parents in Japan.
Though he cared deeply for his parents,
when his mind drifted to the final question that puzzled him,
thoughts of his parents drifted away.
I can sense every movement of those who touch Hierophant Green's barrier.
But Dio ripped apart the entire barrier at once.
Why was not it done strand by strand?
without even a microsecond of a time between them.
The entire barrier, over a 20-meter radius, was ripped apart all at once?
Do not you think taking the blood of a Joestar
would be just the thing to make Jonathan's body completely mine?
How could he hit them all with no time passing between them?
I-I have to tell them about this!
I have to tell Mr. Joestar...
How dare you do that to Kakyoin?!
I will take that body back, for my Grandma Erina!
I shall drink your blood and kill you.
He did not even aim in the right direction.
I suppose he wanted to use up
the last of his strength to go out with a bang.
Kakyoin would not do something pointless at a time like this.
Is he trying to tell me something?
It is the best I can do...
Your Stand is the weakest of all!
I will not let you get away!
Kakyoin, why did you shoot the clock tower?
What was shooting the clock tower supposed to tell me?
Were you able to solve the mystery
of Dio's Stand while all that was going on?
He destroyed the clock with Emerald Splash.
The true power of Dio's The World
is the power to stop time!
Take this, Dio! 20-meter radius Emerald Splash!
But since time has stopped for you, you can neither see nor feel him.
You do not even realize that you have been killed.
There is no way for you to even know what happened.
You died to send me that message... and I have gotten it!
It is a Stand that can stop time and keep moving?
I do not know the meaning of the word panic!
I need to think of something...
Some way to break through and defeat him!
Not going to hit me, Dio?
Were not you going to drink my blood?
You have suffused your body with Hamon
is like a high-voltage wire wrapped around your body, is not it?
You are quite the schemer, you cunning old geezer.
You realized I was using Hamon and made sure not to touch me.
But I have figured something out about your Stand.
Dio, though you can stop time,
it looks like you can only do so very briefly.
About three to four seconds, I would say.
If you could stop time for any longer,
we would have all died back at your mansion,
and you would not have had to chase us down.
So you understand how The World works? !
I will spare you a bit of praise for that.
It was Kakyoin who figured it out.
I will not let Kakyoin die for nothing!
What good does understanding my Stand's power do for you?
What can your Hamon possibly do now?
I do not need to touch the Hamon to attack you!
That old guy fell outta the sky!
What were you doing on the roof?
But he is not quite in range.
I will deal with Joseph first.
The secret of his Stand, The World, is time!
It is a Stand that stops ti
At first, I could only stop time for a mere blink of an eye.
But as my neck wound began to heal,
I soon could stop it for two seconds, then three.
I can now stop time for five seconds.
It is strange to think of it as five seconds, since it occurs when time is stopped,
but I have five seconds in which to act.
Eventually I will get to a minute...
Then ten minutes, then an hour...
Then as long as I want!
knowing that I will be able to stop time for longer and longer...
You were using Hamon to protect your body.
Hamon gave me a little trouble a hundred years ago,
but it is powerless before The World.
I have already taken care of Kakyoin, too.
Instead of running away, you are coming right to me?
told you the secret of The World,
like an exam student scrambling to finish
the problems on an exam until the last moments before the chime?
I cannot beat the shit out of you without getting closer.
Then come as close as you like.
The World is the ultimate Stand.
Even without his power to stop time, his speed and power
far exceed that of your Star Platinum.
So it is the same type of Stand as Star Platinum.
Not much range, but immense power and precise movements.
I wanted to try a little test to find out
just how much more powerful The World was, compared to your Stand.
Though it appears a test was hardly necessary.
Is that what you call just patting me,
and not even enough to hurt?
Well, I guess you ripped my 200,000 yen pants, though.
Why are you Joestars so stubborn about admitting defeat?
I suppose I shall rise to your silly provocation,
and test you just a bit more.
Shall we compare the speed of our attack rushes?
I first experienced stopped time half a year ago.
It began when everything around me seemed to have stopped.
It will be The World's true power that deals the final blow!
